data.title: Station List
data.text:
CLICK HERE

for more current station information from RailStations.com

The below listing of stations is posted for historical purposes only. It has not been updated since April 24, 2006. This listing was provided as a public service as an all-volunteer project by the users of misc.transport.rail.americas and the Delaware Valley Association of Rail Passengers (DVARP). This list of stations used to be updated and posted here twice each year before Amtrak themmselves placed a complete listing of their station information online at their own website at Amtrak.com.

Amtrak Stations

This table gives the street address and destination code of most Amtrak stations as well as some stations no longer served. Locations of Bus Stops change frequently. Please call Amtrak to confirm location. Please report problems to Bill Ensinger. To find out what trains stop at a particular station, visit www.amtrak.com and use the Trakrouter software, or phone 1-800-USA-RAIL.

GPS coordinates for every Amtrak station can be found by doing a web search. They are (or were) available at http://www.geocities.com/CapitolHill/6488/GPS/amtk_sta.txt.

Click here for station location beginning with one of the following letters:
